div.div: Recorded occurrences of indoor and outdoor B. tabaci in France.
div.p: The larger the red circle, the more records from that site (point locations) and the darker the colour of the region, the more records from that départment. They were collected from 1996–2016 by the National Plant Protection Organisation and various technical institutes. Data courtesy of Phillipe Reynaud at ANSES, the French Agency for Food, Environmental and Occupational Health & Safety.
